column5: Thanks to all for the helpful hints and map links for Queenston. My buddy and I had a great day on the water- no fish, but great to try somewhere new nevertheless!
Hence no pictures?  Good you got out!

No ice to speak of, water seemed pretty green- visibility at about 4' maybe? did see a shore angler pull in a nice fish as we arrived- that was it for the action we saw today. Seemed like the speed of the backdift picked up noticeably in the afternoon- does the volume of water coming through the narrows vary due to power requirements or something??

the current is ever changing in the lower river due to water flows for the power plants , intakes and dams the water can raise and lower 4 feet in no time at all it can be tough to figure out at times
